positive.review: Наконец-то что-то свежее! Механика, которую я раньше не встречал, полностью меняет представление о жанре. Браво разработчикам за смелость и новые идеи.
Некоторые сцены и кат-сцены просто взрывают мозг! Такого масштаба и эпичности я не видел давно. Мурашки бежали по коже не один раз.
Игра с котиками просто огонь. Сидишь и кайфуешь с них, очень большая разновидность, спасибо большое за такую замечательную игру
Классная игрушка про котиков, наверное самая лучшая в стиме связанная с ними, очень круто правда. Спасибо большое разработчикам за такую увлекательную игру.
Лучшая игра в своем роде, очень прикольная, сидишь и взаимодействуешь с котиками, что может быть лучше? Огромное спасибо разработчикам за данную игру. Класс!
Прикольная игрулька, бесплатная вообще кайф. Всем советую, если делать нечего и думаете как провести время - вперед

Recomended bcz cats
less than 5 min to 1000 clicks for 2 acheivements
Well, A clicker with cat drawings from their franchise.
BUG : if you just want to see the cats change color, don't click on the craft button (what even is that, didn't understand) bcz you won't see color transformation unless in final/full color during final 10 clicks
Жестоко, сложно, но невероятно удовлетворительно. Чувство, когда наконец-то побеждаешь босса, после десятка попыток — бесценно.
Невероятная атмосфера! Затянуло с первой же минуты и не отпускало до самого финала. Графика и саундтрек — выше всяких похвал.
Fun little clicker! Only two achievements… more, please!
Боевая система — просто огонь! Управление отзывчивое, противники разнообразные, а каждый бой требует тактики. Никакого однообразия, сплошной адреналин.
I mean it has cats what can you really ask for?
cars
meow

Someone send help: 
I clicked on this game because it said it was a horror, it couldn't be more right. I accidentally stopped clicking at 666 and now my life is ruined. They're everywhere; in the next room, in my closet, under my bed..,. and in my head!! sOMEONE sEnD HeLp pleASE. I seriously need it right nwo oh no they're voigng forme

i believe this game has all of the trapped souls of its participants within its programme and here's why. first of all when i stop clicking i immediately see a warped effect around the cats, strange, isn't it? well when you really take a minute to stare at the cats as they move on the screen, it burns your retinas and creates an optical illusion, even when you look away for a moment you see the cats... it's quite scary. i believe that if you were to play for long enough, the cats would eventually start sucking you in to the screen and you will inevitably become one of them, joining them in the universe of cats clicker game. you will never be able to get out but i was one of the lucky ones who managed to see this before it happened. my heart goes out to the victims of this game and i hope this comment comes as a fair warning... and just to note, when i got to 6666 clicks, nothing happened.

A surprisingly engaging puzzle game with adorable cats and simple mechanics. Levels offer a good challenge, and watching your feline friends interact is endlessly entertaining. Well worth checking out for a relaxing and fun experience.
Наконец-то что-то свежее! Механика, которую я раньше не встречал, полностью меняет представление о жанре. Браво разработчикам за смелость и новые идеи.
Некоторые сцены и кат-сцены просто взрывают мозг! Такого масштаба и эпичности я не видел давно. Мурашки бежали по коже не один раз.
Игра с котиками просто огонь. Сидишь и кайфуешь с них, очень большая разновидность, спасибо большое за такую замечательную игру
Классная игрушка про котиков, наверное самая лучшая в стиме связанная с ними, очень круто правда. Спасибо большое разработчикам за такую увлекательную игру.
Лучшая игра в своем роде, очень прикольная, сидишь и взаимодействуешь с котиками, что может быть лучше? Огромное спасибо разработчикам за данную игру. Класс!
Прикольная игрулька, бесплатная вообще кайф. Всем советую, если делать нечего и думаете как провести время - вперед

Recomended bcz cats
less than 5 min to 1000 clicks for 2 acheivements
Well, A clicker with cat drawings from their franchise.
BUG : if you just want to see the cats change color, don't click on the craft button (what even is that, didn't understand) bcz you won't see color transformation unless in final/full color during final 10 clicks

Cats is a simple, charming clicker game for cat lovers. Tap on adorable cats to unlock more, enjoy their meows, and watch your little cat collection grow. It’s light, relaxing, and perfect for a quick dose of cuteness.
Жестоко, сложно, но невероятно удовлетворительно. Чувство, когда наконец-то побеждаешь босса, после десятка попыток — бесценно.
Невероятная атмосфера! Затянуло с первой же минуты и не отпускало до самого финала. Графика и саундтрек — выше всяких похвал.
Fun little clicker! Only two achievements… more, please!
Боевая система — просто огонь! Управление отзывчивое, противники разнообразные, а каждый бой требует тактики. Никакого однообразия, сплошной адреналин.
Why did the cat sit on the computer? It wanted to keep an eye on the mouse!
I mean it has cats what can you really ask for?
10/10 CATS!

i believe this game has all of the trapped souls of its participants within its programme and here's why. first of all when i stop clicking i immediately see a warped effect around the cats, strange, isn't it? well when you really take a minute to stare at the cats as they move on the screen, it burns your retinas and creates an optical illusion, even when you look away for a moment you see the cats... it's quite scary. i believe that if you were to play for long enough, the cats would eventually start sucking you in to the screen and you will inevitably become one of them, joining them in the universe of cats clicker game. you will never be able to get out but i was one of the lucky ones who managed to see this before it happened. my heart goes out to the victims of this game and i hope this comment comes as a fair warning... and just to note, when i got to 6666 clicks, nothing happened.

negative.review: Was naively expecting some kind of twist, but the only horror was clicking the cat.

Click until you're tired of it, I guess. This game feels a little pointless.

The two achievements are easy, though.

[h1]Another piece of steam item drop slop.[/h1]
Only reason to get this is if you want random cat themed items to showcase on your profile.
click 1000 time on a cat to get 2 achievements, it could be better than this even it's free game
Don't play. The shame of having the achievements is not worth it.
lol im not really sure what im supposed to do with this
damningly pointless
Zero psychological horror

[b]Main Scenario:[/b] Cats  
[b]Difficulty:[/b] F  
[b]Time Limit:[/b] None  
[b]Clear Condition:[/b] Click the cats and collect them all  
[b]Failure Condition:[/b] Stop clicking before you’ve gathered every cat  
[b]Clear Reward:[/b] Title: [Cat Collector]  
[b]Extra:[/b] A Constellation who values perfection observes your progress; all achievements must be obtained  

[b]Personal Rating:[/b] 1/10
Was naively expecting some kind of twist, but the only horror was clicking the cat.

Click until you're tired of it, I guess. This game feels a little pointless.

The two achievements are easy, though.

Cats a clicker game whit two very easy achievement to get there are other thing to do but not much to it then doing the clicker part and getting the achievement then you be done and hearing the cat say meow a lot not soo get to heard a lot XD
really bad and boring cat clicker game, not even worth it for free

[h3] Cats - A Negative Review [/h3]

[h3] What To Expect? [/h3]
It's a clicker game in which you just click a cat, that's really it. As you click more the cat changes color, design, and there's a counter to show how many times you've clicked. The more you play the game, you get random Steam Inventory drops which you could sell on the Steam market.

[h3] Visuals and Performance [/h3]
Very basic clicker game, not much going on with it other than clicking. For performance, it should run on anything, didn't come across bugs.

[h3] My Recommendations [/h3]
I honestly wouldn't recommend this to anybody, it's just a clicker game to get items for the Steam market. I would avoid it.
How is this 1 GB?  It's a handful of cat drawings and a 30 second music loop and zero actual game play.

[h1]Another piece of steam item drop slop.[/h1]
Only reason to get this is if you want random cat themed items to showcase on your profile.
click 1000 time on a cat to get 2 achievements, it could be better than this even it's free game
Don't play. The shame of having the achievements is not worth it.
lol im not really sure what im supposed to do with this
Bongo cat is much better
Do I even need to explain myself?
damningly pointless
Zero psychological horror

It's a clicker game in which you just click a cat, that's really it. As you click more the cat changes color, design, and there's a counter to show how many times you've clicked. The more you play the game, you get random Steam Inventory drops which you could sell on the Steam market.

[h3] Visuals and Performance [/h3]
Very basic clicker game, not much going on with it other than clicking. For performance, it should run on anything, didn't come across bugs.

[h3] My Recommendations [/h3]
I honestly wouldn't recommend this to anybody, it's just a clicker game to get items for the Steam market. I would avoid it.
How is this 1 GB?  It's a handful of cat drawings and a 30 second music loop and zero actual game play.

[h1]Another piece of steam item drop slop.[/h1]
Only reason to get this is if you want random cat themed items to showcase on your profile.
